div.span:
Step 0: Entry / Onboarding
New / Returning / Port-in / Guest
Explain location permission
Auto-detect or manual address

Step 1: Need Analysis
Progressive questionnaire
Intent (free-text + suggestions)
Product preference
Interests
Current usage
Budget slider
Address (auto/manual + map)
Feasibility toggle
Save context (guest/sign-in)

Step 2: Processing
Coverage & promos & eligibility checks
Instant when possible
Show fallback (cached/manual verify)

Step 3: Recommendations
Header chips: Location verified, Segment, Category, Price range
Plan Cards (Available by default)
Why recommended panel
Compare up to 3 (drawer)
Also viewed / Bundles
Plan detail (modal)
Edge indicators (conditional avail.)
CTAs: Activate / Book install / Chat

Step 3a: Activate Now
Inline form: user details, ID upload, payment
Eligibility checks inline
Schedule installation
Credit check if needed

Step 3b: Book Installation
Pick date/time
Technician availability
ETA

Step 3c: Chat for Help
Context-aware: selected plan + notes

Step 4: Confirmation & Feedback
Order number, schedule, activation date
Plan summary
Feedback (1â€“5 + comment)
Save to profile / calendar / share

Edge: Location denied
Allow manual PIN/address
Verify after submit
Explain impact

Edge: No eligible plans
Waitlist / Express interest
Call agent / Chat
Show nearby alternatives

Edge: Limited promo inventory
Live counts + countdown

Edge: Backend error
Cached offers
Manual verify phone

Signal loop
Use selection & feedback to refine future recos
